overnight.html:
Congrats, your ticket has been purchased! After we review your identification and vaccination we will send your ticket ID number and overnight stay information! We look forward to seeing you walk through the red carpet with your drip on ;)

Friday June 10th, doors open at 7:00 PM.

Please email mtaprom@gmail.com if you have further questions

#prom2k22 #mnteenactivists
